page.title: 17 SMALL FARMING
page.content: My Dad was born in Ireland and came to this country to work in Denham and later Chesham.He was attracted by the trees,fields and hills.The farm is20.25 acres.As he has only just started to farm 10acres are laid to hay.Animals on the farm include a donkey,beef cattle,heifers(2 of which we hope to put in calf).We use the milk for domestic use and to feed the calves. We also have some poultry .In the future it is hoped that some pigs and sheep can be purchased.Some of the land has been fenced off to grow vegetables. The goods are marketed in a 30 mile radius around Slough,Thame,Reading, Aylesbury.As the farm is small my Dad has another job.
